techmeme.title: Google says its greenhouse gas emissions have surged 48% in the past five years due to the expansion of the data centers that underpin its AI efforts (Financial Times)
For ~10 years, millions of macOS and iOS apps using CocoaPods were vulnerable to a serious flaw in the dependency manager, which was patched in October 2023 (Dan Goodin/Ars Technica)
Figma disables its recently launched generative AI app design tool Make Design, after a user showed it copied Apple's Weather when asked to design a weather app (Emanuel Maiberg/404 Media)
SCOTUS agrees to consider whether a Texas law requiring porn sites to verify users' ages violates the First Amendment, in its next term, which starts in October (Andrew Chung/Reuters)

Source: Google plans AI features for the Pixel 9 under the Google AI brand, like Pixel Screenshots, which lets users search their screenshots using on-device AI (Kamila Wojciechowska/Android Authority)
